title: The Apps That I Use (Most Available on Windows, Mac and Linux!)
description:
In this video, I show you the 10 apps that I use most frequently on my Linux PC...but almost all of these work on Windows and Mac too!

0:00 Intro
0:41 Brave
2:36 Emacs
4:04 Alacritty and Fish
5:21 OBS
6:30 Kdenlive
7:51 Gimp
9:00 VLC
11:27 Virt-Manager
13:02 TastyTrade 
15:33 Thanks to the Patrons
